text: 26.65: Mt 9.3; Mk 14.63; Zo 10.33; FG 14.1426.65: Wkp 24.16Ana ne suaŋgim, Fhe Bakɨmen rotu gari guman pan mba kameŋ mbararagiap, ŋgava mbatɨga muuŋgiap, nduara won shagi suigap, nta karasuegap, khaŋ nzuai, “Ana Fhe Bakɨme nzɨɨi. Nza wom thaŋ suaŋv harigi gumgir kamɨrim, mbe zɨv kha guma muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi bun suaŋrie? Fhuvara. Nde ntigera mbararagim, ana Fhe Bakɨme sɨɨŋgi.
